person.persName: Robert G. Beverley (Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer and grocery merchant. Virginia native. Son of William Beverley and Sarah Ann Posey Beverley. Married to Sarah P. Hopkins Beverley in Henderson County, Kentucky, on May 14, 1835. Father of John P. Beverley, Bettie Beverley, George B. Beverley, Philip N. Beverley, Robert G. Beverley, Alexander Beverley, Bland Beverley, William W. Beverley, and Minnie G. Beverley. Farmer and merchant in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1850. Owned Ellis [Unknown], Jackson [Unknown], and Seth [Unknown] in Henderson County in 1855. Grocery merchant in Henderson County in 1860. Owned thirty-nine enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1860.
